critique: This document pertains to the Renegotiation Act of 1951 and designates the Federal Facilities Corporation as an agency subject to Title I of the Act. It clarifies the applicability of the Act to contracts with the Corporation and related subcontracts, specifying the timeframes for which the provisions apply. There is nothing about ideological tilt, immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, and social inclusion. Therefore, all scores should be 0.
